Right input. Default is X axis.

member.param: The amount of force to apply.

member.summary: Gets the speed and direction of this Player.

member.summary: Temporarily modifies this player's MovementSpeed.

member.param: The time in seconds in which TemporaryMovementSpeed will be in effect.
member.returns: The IEnumerator that handles timing.

member.summary: Sets the data for the next execution of OnTick.

member.summary: Pauses this Tick from executing until this (TogglePauseTick) is called again.

member.summary: Stop executing this Tick.

member.name: T:MW.Pathfinding.Pathfinding`1
member.summary: Provides the A* Pathfinding implementation for T.
member.typeparam: Generic type that implements INode and IHeapItem for T that defines a traversable waypoint.

member.name: M:MW.Pathfinding.Pathfinding`1.AStar(`0,`0,System.Collections.Generic.List{`0}@,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.Action{System.Collections.Generic.List{`0}},System.Action{System.Collections.Generic.List{`0}},System.Boolean)
member.summary: A* pathfinds from Origin to Destination looking uDepth times within a uMapSize.
member.param: Reference T List of that make up the path from Origin to Destination.
The total size of the map to be traversed. (The number of INodes).
What to do when a path is found? Passes the reference successful Path as a parameter.
What to do when a path cannot be found? Passes the current state of the Path as a parameter.
member.returns: Whether or not a path was found from Origin to Destination within uDepth in uMapSize.

member.name: T:MW.Pathfinding.PathRegister`1
member.summary: Computes a number of paths over a number of frames.
member.typeparam: Generic type that implements INode and IHeapItem for T that defines a traversable waypoint.

member.name: M:MW.Pathfinding.PathRegister`1.RequestPath(`0,`0,System.Action{System.Collections.Generic.List{`0}},System.Action{System.Collections.Generic.List{`0}})
member.summary: Register a path to compute when possible.
member.remarks: This is on a first-in, first-out basis. A Queue.
member.param: What to do when a path is found? List of T pathway.
What to do when a path cannot be found? List of T pathway attempt.

member.name: M:MW.Pathfinding.PathRegister`1.ComputeNext
member.summary: Computes the next path in FIFO.
member.returns: Whether or not a computation was executed.

member.name: M:MW.Pathfinding.PathRegister`1.ComputeBatch(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Computes BatchSize paths in a single call.
member.param: The number of paths to compute.

member.name: M:MW.Pathfinding.PathRegister`1.GetPathQueueSize
member.summary: Gets the number of agents waiting to compute paths.
member.returns: Unsigned integer number of T's awaiting a path.

member.summary: Halt the computation of paths.

member.name: M:MW.Pathfinding.MPathManager`1.Resume
member.summary: Continue the computation of paths.

member.name: M:MW.Pathfinding.MPathManager`1.Status

member.summary: The vector cross ^ product.

The coordinates where the line will end.
The starting colour gradient for this line.
The ending colour gradient for this line.
The offset to place this line.
The material used to draw the line.
Should this line use world space?
